entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle after midnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
